item.title: Lauren add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "Experience is a brutal teacher, but you learn fast." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "I am a part of everything that I have read." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description:
"In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing. The worst thing you can do is nothing."
[<i>The Information Technology Management Reform Act of 1995:</i> Hearing before the Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management and the District of Columbia of the Committee on Governmental Affairs (1996)]" -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
item.description: "The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained in sudden flight but, they while their companions slept, they were toiling upwards in the night." -- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
